column4: i think that packages are ubuntu's single biggest weakness atm, but they are getting better
not huge enough for my liking :D
yeah i had gentoo damn portage is sweet
is there some shorthand way of cd'ing up a directory?
yeah i presume it would, i've just never looked for how to do it :)
I have a friend on OSX that I keep giving bash hints to slowly but surely.
I would invest in a Mac if I weren't so invested in PC hardware already.
But, a co-worker loaded Ubunut warty on an old iMac and it ran very nicely.  I was impressed.
it's pretty nice, linux on ppc has some annoying things though
I hate that for things like Flash it would take Macromedia all of ten minutes to produce a PPC port.
yeah the problem is ppc linux is a niche in a niche
